subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|正|鳥|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|t2=bird}} ― a kind of bird.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “in it; on it; here”
: From {{och-l|於|id=2}} + {{m|och||*-n|demonstrative suffix|sc=Latn}}, an element equivalent to {{zh-l|*之|him; her; it}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}; {{zh-ref|Pulleyblank, 1995}}). Compare {{och-l|爰}}.

; “where; how”
: Probably a variant of {{och-l|安|where; how}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
